law.catch_line: A person may not reapply for a license within 6 months after the person has had a license:...

text.section:
A person may not reapply for a license within 6 months after the person has had a license:
denied after a hearing; or
revoked.
The Commission may reinstate the license of a person whose license has been suspended or revoked under this subtitle only if the person passes the examination that the Commission requires.
